website_summaries.verdict: A tasty chew already does wonders for dogs dealing with anxiety, but the added benefits of chamomile and lavender make it easier for them to unwind.
pros: Rolled rawhide-like design, using a vegetable-based rawhide substitute
Uses real chicken, chamomile, and lavender
cons: Not for dogs with a poultry allergy

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: My dog got deathly ill the night after he ate this chew. I am not sure if it was something in the ingredients, or if it was because he was able to chew off a whole big chunk and swallow it. The reason I bought these was because they state that it is unlike rawhide. Although it is digestible, big chunks can be swallowed. After a horrible night of watching my dog both throw up and have diarrhea, I took him to the vet. Long story short, $700 dollars later, he is doing fine. An X-ray demonstrated that it had not gotten lodged in his intestine or colon. If your dog is a big chewer, do NOT purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Great for puppies
customer_reviews.text: My dog really likes these and they are rawhide free which I love. The texture is soft/chewy. Not a particularly long lasting bone but great for my teething puppy as he has gotten selective. The price is good for what it is. I am not wild about the ingredients, wish they were more real/food based. But the calming benefits do seem to help my dog in his kennel and at bed time.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: These Work Well
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these and scarf them down in about 2 seconds, so if you're looking for something to keep the dog busy, these might not be the best. They work very well to calm them. I always give them to the dogs when we bring in a new foster dog to try to bring down some of the anxiety. They also help to quiet down super high energy/crazy dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us!
customer_reviews.text: My Chihuahua and Chihuahua mix dogs didn't get halfway through the bag before turning up thier little noses! As for any calming effects I certainly didn't see any! My two little angels have trouble sleeping through the night and I was so hopeful that these bones might help! NOT! They love all of the other Smart Bones so we thought we would give this a try. It didn't help, it didn't work, and they just didn't like the taste! Oh well!
customer_reviews.author: Delighted Artist

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical because I have two very active pit bulls and they are very hyperactive in the evenings when we are trying to settle down and watch a movie. I tried these because they are advertised as having a calming effect. I figured it was worth a try. Now each night when we start a movie, I give them each one and they are calm and sleeping right afterwards. The first night I thought coincidence, but it has been nearly a week now and same results. I am ordering more today.
customer_reviews.author: Lenore C-N

customer_reviews.title: Work so well
customer_reviews.text: I have a 200 pound English mastiff who has severe neuroses. These bones are like gold to me. Just two days a day and I have my dog back. She is playful income not afraid to walk on the tile floor. Yes my 200 pound dog is afraid to walk on the tile floor for fear that she will follow through it I suppose. Who knows what goes on in a damaged mind animals have mental illnesses as well and this really helps her.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Rejected by two dogs that eat EVERYTHING
customer_reviews.text: Dogs HATE these. It is the ONLY tree as t I have ever gotten them they reject. I've seen them lay on the floor for up to 3-days before "disappearing". Even then I'm not sure they were eventually eaten. The dos may have learned to throw them out. LOL. Maybe wife tossed it out. No clue where it went but SERIOUSLY DOUBT THE DOGS ATE THEM. Our dogs eat anything, EVERYTHING, but won't eat these.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Good treats
customer_reviews.text: This really helped my dogs be calm. I have 5 and 3 bark a lot. I was able to give them 1 of these and the bark was very little. It was amazing. I will def re order this..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No calming effects noticed
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the calming effect, and I noticed no change at all with my dogs. I have four ranging from 10 to 24 pounds, all of whom have had one of these, and I've noticed nothing, except compared to other Smartbone products, these are liked the least. I will not be ordering more. Note: the main ingredient is CORN (I have a dog who can't digest corn) and they are made in VIETNAM
customer_reviews.author: ald

customer_reviews.title: Takes the edge off
customer_reviews.text: I give my dog three rolls (she's 55lbs) and it takes about 30 minutes for them to fully kick in. They make her less excitable overall; they more tone down the intensity of all of her feelings, rather than eliminating them completely. Behaviorally, this makes her act out less intensely as well (eg: no jumping, whining, pacing, etc.), and I think that is a very reasonable expectation for a fairly natural solution. Added bonus: since it isn't rawhide, she doesn't get GI issues. I am very happy with the product and will continue to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: ssh

customer_reviews.title: Best dog treat brand!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of only two brands of treats I will buy for my dog. They don’t actually calm her down but she still loves them. She’s a HUGE and incredibly fast chewer so these only last about one to two minutes max. She’s got a sensitive stomach but these have never made her sick like other treats. They’ve got so many flavors and shapes it’s amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give zero stars I would. We gave our 60 pound healthy dog one of these the same day they arrived. Within a few hours he was vomiting everywhere and had horrendous diarrhea. We knew it was the chew stick because of the pieces of green and white that were in all of it! He has not had any issues like this before with chew sticks of other brands; I wanted to try one purported to be natural, clearly it was not for him.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy for the dogs
customer_reviews.text: I'd give a 5 but it does nothing for my dog to calm down. although she loves eating them which is why I gave 4 stars. If you're buying them for calming purposes then I'm not sure it will be working. I have a 35 lbs beagle who gets hyper for 15-20 min and I usually give her one to two before I feel she is getting there. Doesn't do anything....my dog is still hyper and running around but she does love eating them.
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for anxious pups, and dog sitters!
customer_reviews.text: I've lost count of how many times I've bought these! I often dog sit and these treats are wonderful for anxious pups! Since they are not rawhide I'm not as concerned about choking hazards. My own dog, already a mellow fellow loves these too. I've bought several other variations of "Smart Bones" and have had none refused! My dog, while being super laid back, is not a voracious treat lover so the fact that he loves all these bones says a lot to me!
customer_reviews.author: S. Cavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: The size of the Chew itself was not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I probably did not read the description carefully enough as these were really not the size I had expected. We have two large golden retrievers and they were able to chew them up within minutes. They did love them however so they must’ve had a great flavor. I will look for them again to see if they have a larger size!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Bad on all sides
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping there would be some calming qualities to these treats... First off had to order 4 packs of them to get them to ship with my order. Figured it'd at least be a good treat for my dog. Didnt expect much from them considering the "calming" claim comes from the lavender and chamomile flavoring. But i figured it was a "keep them busy by chewing" thing at least. Not only does my medium sized dog inhale 1 of these sticks in a second, it doesn't calm him and more than one causes dierreha.
customer_reviews.author: Angel lambert

customer_reviews.title: My dogs like them
customer_reviews.text: My dogs really like these bones. I can't really say if they have an actual calming effect because I give them one at night before bedtime. They are a little on the small side for my dogs, blue heeler and blue heeler mix, but they still like them. For the amount you get, I think the purchase price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: LBBM

customer_reviews.title: Flavor must be good
customer_reviews.text: I've pretty much getting the SmartBones now. And with multiple dogs (4 plus fosters), they enjoy and eat it up....we can't have rawhide or partially eaten treats laying around....those with multiple dogs will understand. Why look for a fight?
customer_reviews.author: R BTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Short-lived, messy... watch your little dogs
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea of these, but they break apart VERY quickly. I had to monitor my little dog as he "chewed" (ate) big chunks of this. Also, why is FD&C Blue No. 1 necessary? There have been neurobehavioral effects observed in animals in several studies looking at this ingredient. So what if the risk is low? What value does it add? I certainly don't appreciate the goopy blue mess (found little soggy chunks around the house), and I'm pretty certain my dog doesn't give a rip about the aesthetic of his treat.
customer_reviews.author: jesseturn

customer_reviews.title: Literally the opposite of calming.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my puppy an hour before bedtime to try to calm her down... she scarfed down the whole thing in about 10 minutes and then went INSANE! She is usually more tired at this time and she was wild! She barked at me and my partner, she was snapping at us, she was flying around the apartment... it was literally the LAST thing I wanted to happen. It was terrible and traumatic for everyone. Just don’t get them.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Our new go to bedtime treat
customer_reviews.text: These have become our go to bedtime treat. As soon as we grab one and give the command 'go to bed' Theodore runs up the stairs right into his bed. He is 80lbs and a fairly aggressive chewer and they last him 2-3 minutes, which is longer than most other treats (even ones that are much more pricey) last him. Not 100% sure if they actually work to calm our doggo down, but they certainly don't hurt. We are now subscribed to get these every month!
customer_reviews.author: Jrose622

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL
customer_reviews.text: I will only buy Dream Bone treats for my 2 fur babies. I just received 9 bags today. My fur babies know when we receive a box from Amazon (THEY GET SO EXCITED and CAN'T WAIT FOR ME TO OPEN it). So now my fur babies think every Amazon package it their treats.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn

customer_reviews.title: They work! Calms my dogs!
customer_reviews.text: These aren't that long lasting, but my dogs love the flavor. They settle down quickly after they've had one, which is great since they hate loud noise, and they have actually slept through some of the thunderstorms we have here
customer_reviews.author: Donna L. Sinel

customer_reviews.title: My dog seemed to be a little 'stoned' after eating one
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know what to expect, hoped for a calmer dog when my Chihuahua/terrier gets all worked up. I went to pet him on the head and he looked at me like I had scared him. Maybe I should have gave him only a piece of the stick instead of the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my puppy. There is times at night she just wants to keep playing when it's bed time. I thought giving her one of these right before bed would help. I haven't seen a difference. The flavor must be good because these are gone in minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Gizmo loves these!
customer_reviews.text: As far as the flavor..how would I know that??? LOL..however my Gizmo loves them. I will say this, if you're looking at these and thinking they're going to take away your furbabies' anxiety..stop here,,pump your brakes..I have a 9lb yorkie and he is no different after eating these. But He LOVES Smartbones and knowing that he loves them makes me love them, too!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi S.

customer_reviews.title: My pups love 'em
customer_reviews.text: I can't attest for the taste, but my pups love these and go to the treat jar and "ask" for one every day. I do know, they smell heavenly, like hot buttered toast with honey? I can't put my finger on it, but they smell good to me, and the babies love them, and I feel good about giving these to them because of the wholesome ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Tera Lanphear

customer_reviews.title: Not calming, but good dog treats
customer_reviews.text: My high energy/high anxiety labs love to chew on bones but get upset stomachs from rawhide. These calming bones listed as a healthy alternative to rawhide seemed to be the perfect combination. While they were nice bones for my dogs to chew on, albeit small for labs and devoured a little quicker than I would have liked, they did not give any stomach troubles like rawhide does. However they also did not seem to do anything in terms of calming. I would say if you have a smaller dog that wants a non-rawhide bone this is a great choice but don't be fooled into thinking they'll help with anything other than that.
customer_reviews.author: BrownDogBrands

customer_reviews.title: My puppy loves these!
customer_reviews.text: These are now a regular purchase in my house. I have a cocker spaniel puppy who had way too much energy at bed time. I got these to try and he loves them. I give him one at bed time, he chews it, then lays down and goes right to sleep. It relaxes him just enough to wind down. Now every night when we go to bed, he jumps up on the bed and watches me expectantly until he gets one!
customer_reviews.author: jjblh

customer_reviews.title: THESE SmartBones have now Earned A FIVE Star from Us.
customer_reviews.text: My terrier 20 ob. J. R Terrier Mix likes these and she is hard to please. I've continued giving Lily these every other day for over 2 years now, she has tried all the flavors and likes them all but She seems to like the green stripped calming ones best but never says No to any of their products I have tried. And I am still re-ordering monthly. She still likes them And her teeth and gums look amazing for a nearly 4 years old. I just upgraded my Star and changed it from a 4 to a well earned 5 Star from Me. I Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B.

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this
customer_reviews.text: I like these because they don't have the knots at the ends, which my dogs always choke on. They are easy for them to chew, my only issue is when they get down to the end they usually swallow it, but thats unavoidable. The good thing is they digest it easy and don't throw it up later on like with other bones. I'm not sure how well it works to keep them calm, but they are happy while they are chewing.
customer_reviews.author: ATC

customer_reviews.title: Garbage Ingredients!! Sugars, Salt, Fillers
customer_reviews.text: Look at the ingredients before you buy! CORN, Chicken (only decent ingredient), SORBITOL, FRUCTOSE, MALTODEXTRIN, BARLEY MALT SYRUP, GELATIN, SALT, ARTIFICIAL FLAVORS, TITANIUM DIOXIDE... then finally a few real ingredients - way down on the list. Salt, sugar and fillers. Shameful to advertise these as anything a dog should eat.
customer_reviews.author: LOlsen

customer_reviews.title: Could be calming effect or just the fact he has a treat, who knows.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 55lb mixed breed who has anxiety that eventually turns into an aggressive outburst. I literally bought these for the heck of it. I feed him one in the morning before I go to work and my dog walker feeds him another one around 5 hours later. I don't think they are a sure fix, but they do seem to make him less anxious in the crate. They do not seem to affect his digestive system either. It could all be a placebo effect, but would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: SarahMonroe

customer_reviews.title: Made my dogs super sick!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These made my dogs so sick! My German Shepherd has been throwing up constantly for the last 12 hours and can’t keep any food down since having these treats. Absolutely nothing else in his life has changed, he had one of these treats yesterday, and has been sick ever cents. Absolutely do not, I repeat do not buy these treats for your dogs. They will become violently ill!
customer_reviews.author: DeEtta S.

customer_reviews.title: Smells fresh
customer_reviews.text: These are a little strange, but our dog, seems to love them. They can't be broken in half, so you have to give your dog the whole treat at one time. They have a fresh, clean scent, which is appreciated, as I do not eat meat, and the smell of most dog treats makes me nauseous. As for the calming effect, I really can't tell because dog is so chill all the time already.
customer_reviews.author: Bean

customer_reviews.title: Happy dogs without odor
customer_reviews.text: I have mini schnauzers and they love these. They last long enough to keep them busy and satisfied but will not survive to the next day. I didn’t notice any bad smell, breath or “toots”.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher G.

customer_reviews.title: Quite satisfied
customer_reviews.text: My boy LOVES these things. He's a 2lb chi-weenie and these things definitely keep him busy and has no problem digesting them. He doesn't seem to be relaxed, which is funny to me that that would even be a thing. But whatever, we are loyal customers and my pup appreciates them.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan.
customer_reviews.text: These are just okay. My dog loved them, but his attitude just got worse after he finished the treat. They were so messy on his face and they would get all over whatever he way laying on as he chewed. They did keep him busy for about 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Makenzie Ratliff

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: We give these to our puppy when it gets closer to bed time and she hasn’t settled down. Usually within about 30 minutes after having one she chills out. They were helpful too after her spay surgery when we needed to keep her calm and still.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Price has doubled & no calming effect...BOOOO!!
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased these on Amazon Prime Now, however, they are no longer available there, so I turned to regular Amazon Prime. Today, while placing an order on regular Amazon Prime, these chews went up over $4 per package...while in my cart! My dogs of all ages & sizes do enjoy these treats, however, they do nothing for calming them, therefore, I will NOT be paying an additional four dollars per package for these, Amazon. Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Flossie Rae

customer_reviews.title: Maybe not for my dogs but this is a good brand
customer_reviews.text: My dogs didn't seem to like this item much and I didn't see any "calming effects" but I like the fact this is a healthy option for dogs and it was reasonably priced. I just don't know if I'd but again. I like the brand and buy other of their products often.
customer_reviews.author: G Ubinas

customer_reviews.title: Rawhide free. Dogs love them.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given these “calming chews” a 5 star but straight out there’s nothing calming about them. Misleading to the consumer. I love that they’re rawhide free and most important my four-legged best friend enjoys them.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Works good for my wandering senior dog.
customer_reviews.text: I have a senior dog who "paces" and can't seem to relax. He still has enough teeth to chew these. These help him relax so he can sleep. When I give one of these to him, he lets out a happy sigh.
customer_reviews.author: K9 Fan

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love these calming treats
customer_reviews.text: My 2 dogs both love these. As far as the calming effectiveness, I do think they are a little bit calming. I usually give them to my dogs before I leave the house so they don't get too upset. However, they aren't as calming as some other brands I've tried (such as NaturVet Quiet Moments treats), but that's probably because the NaturVet brand has Melatonin in them. I'm still giving 5 stars because my dogs love the taste and they do calm down a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Sloths&Pancakes

customer_reviews.title: Worked on our Jack's.
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 dogs, 18# Parsons Russell & a rescue dog jack Russell mix 20#. Over the 4th of July we gave them each half a stick & after 60 - 90 minutes they were sleepy eyed blobs. We tested 1/4 of a stick a few weeks later which relaxed the rescue dog but seemed to make the nervous pacer even more nervous. Now we know a better dosage for the 2 difference t personalities & they loved eating the treat so taste was not a factor.
customer_reviews.author: cbwal

customer_reviews.title: My dogs are happy to eat these
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if they have a calming effect like they are supposed to, but my dogs sure do like to eat them. And they are quiet while doing it. Can't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Sazqwatch

customer_reviews.title: My dog has very bad anxiety, especially separation anxiety
customer_reviews.text: My dog has very bad anxiety, especially separation anxiety. These have become our go to option for him when we are leaving him in his crate. It gives him something to chew, while also calming him. They are also great for when we have company and we can't give him as much attention as usual. It helps him stay calm an keeps him occupied.
customer_reviews.author: martin062212

customer_reviews.title: My dog says yes
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes them! They smell of artificial blueberries. I have not tried them myself so I cannot speak on their flavor. Not sure if they actually help calm my dog, but she is very energetic and almost nothing does that.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda White

customer_reviews.title: Rawhide free, but not a gnaw treat for my dog.
customer_reviews.text: My pup has separation anxiety when he can’t see me, and I thought these would help, but they don’t really calm my dog much. He likes the flavor, and I like that it’s rawhide free. I wish they were longer lasting, something my dog could chew on for awhile. He goes through these like they were nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne E May

customer_reviews.title: Smartbones Functional Dog Calming Chews really work
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these calming dog chews several times for my mother's Bichon Frise. He just loves them and has to have one every morning. He loves the taste and my Mom loves how he settles down after he's enjoyed his treat. I can definitely recommend this product or your dog.
customer_reviews.author: N. Fredrick

customer_reviews.title: Great as usual!
customer_reviews.text: Will happily order again! Some f the reviews were off putting to me and as a customer of the other similar brand, I knew I wouldn't have to worry about some of the "troubles" other reviews and their pets seemed to experience. These are treats with very limited ingredients and all ones you can pronounce and have heard of before. Good product! Calming sticks, well I would say if your dog likes to chew and is an "nervous/anxious" chewer, then these, just like other chews, will fulfill the "calming" effect that these sticks are titled as. Wish they had bones!!
customer_reviews.author: Grumpye

customer_reviews.title: A waste
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my puppy who would get a little crazy before bedtime. I was hoping these could help calm her down on the really crazy nights. I saw no change in her at all after giving her these. So she is either just too hyper or these just don't work.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Dog likes them
customer_reviews.text: My neurotic dog loves these. I'm not sure if they really have a calming effect on her, but she really likes them and they don't upset her stomach like a lot of rawhide chews. They also last longer than some of the other "rawhide-esque" treat sticks I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Doggies did love these
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 beagles & they both loved these for months!!! Then with the last 2 shipments (I subscribe to this product for monthly delivery), they both must have had issues digesting it & both threw up after eating it. I tried a few times but same result. Tried again with next shipment & same outcome. Not sure if ingredients changed or my dogs bellies are more sensitive now.
customer_reviews.author: M. Camp

customer_reviews.title: Easy, affordable and a dog favorite!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these. They are large breed dogs so they don’t last long but I didn’t expect them to. They are nice treat when it’s time to crate up!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Palkovic

customer_reviews.title: Actually does calm your pups!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these to chew on! Even the picky dog! They actually seem to calm the dogs down too! They are puppies and very hyper so at bedtime or when I leave them in the cage for a few hours I’ll give them one about 10 minutes before and they chill out and sleep usually. They seem to enjoy the flavor also!
customer_reviews.author: natalie e karmol

customer_reviews.title: Not calming, just a regular treat
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves them, but his tastes aren't exactly refined...he also enjoys garbage and cat poo. He likes them and that's important, but they don't seem to have any kind of calming effect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved by All and a STEAL!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 5 pounder and she LOVES these. I buy these for just over $5 for 16 and cut them in half for her - perfect size! That makes 32 treats and for much less than the mini bones of the same brand. Awesome buy! I always buy multiples as my 3 pitties love them too!
customer_reviews.author: LA721

customer_reviews.title: Winner winner
customer_reviews.text: Best dog treat ever!! My pups love them, and they don’t smell gross, actually kinda nice. So I don’t have to worry about giving them treat and messing up furniture with it or having bad smelling breath, and they both love them—Total win win!!
customer_reviews.author: Brie

customer_reviews.title: He likes them..
customer_reviews.text: My picky Lasa likes them, first time to try, will be getting more, don't know it they calm, Hey, he is eating them. Yippee! As he eats wet food I give him the harder treats for teeth, plus he needs to calm at times. Maybe I will try one...
customer_reviews.author: Sunnyside Up

customer_reviews.title: Smaller then Chewy,com
customer_reviews.text: The sticks seemed smaller in length on this order compared to an order I did on chewy.com. The price was better, yet about a 1/4 inch smaller. In fact I put them side by side and they were smaller. The oz said the same; not true in my order. Net time I will take a photo!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: They work!!!
customer_reviews.text: This must have calming treat is a God sent. It helps her anxiety & they help her fall asleep and stay asleep during the night not up & down up & down and when my friend brings her dogs it helps her nerves with them i wish my friend also I love
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Gail Walker

customer_reviews.title: The dog does not approve.
customer_reviews.text: I have to base reviews like this off my dog, of course. I mean, these bones look great and I know a lot of dogs love them, but mine does not, so these rate low in our household. They just sit there in the closet, waiting to be chewed.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Puke Sticks
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible and make my dog puke everytime she has one...we finally figured it out and won’t be purchasing these ever again! Don’t buy them!
customer_reviews.author: CpggReynolds

customer_reviews.title: Not Made in the US
customer_reviews.text: Gave one of my dogs the runs and the other dog severe gas. This isn’t for our beagles. It was a great price but not good for them.
customer_reviews.author: ctp2236

customer_reviews.title: Cleans teeth
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old shiba inu loves these treats. They last alot longer and it cleans his teeth! I recommend at least giving your dog this treat 2x a week for a cleaner smile.
customer_reviews.author: Chay

customer_reviews.title: Good non-rawhide snacks
customer_reviews.text: Do these calm down my dog? Nope. But he likes them. I am suspect when items, especially edibles are not from the U.S. However, my mini Aussie has had these and the skin & coat variety, and has never been ill/sick. I wish they lasted longer-at least with my 30-lb dog they disappear quickly. I prefer not to give my dog rawhide, so these are a good alternative.
customer_reviews.author: AU DustTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Just ok in my dog’s opinion
customer_reviews.text: I keep thinking he’s eating these, but I find the pieces all over the place. I don’t think they calm my hyper new dog, but I may try them again.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Girl

customer_reviews.title: OMG these work!
customer_reviews.text: These are like Xanax for dogs. I give them to my 2 little dogs and they are so chill all of a sudden. 10/10 recommend if you need a little doggie chill time
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: We would repurchase.
customer_reviews.text: The puppies seemed to enjoy these as it kept them busy. I sometimes had to remind them to go back to them but they did finish them and it calmed them as they chewed.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa

customer_reviews.title: Just enough to calm her in the hotel room
customer_reviews.text: we bought these for a long car trip and a week in hotel rooms, one stick mellowed her out enough so that the noises in the hotel room did make her bark
customer_reviews.author: Scorrao

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Loved Them
customer_reviews.text: I order a lot of the Smart Bones products. I absolutely love everything I have ordered!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Storer

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Dogs really like it but it gives them diarrhea. ALL of the products from Smart Bones do this for my dogs, German Shepard/Lab mix dogs.
customer_reviews.author: A Wife, Mom, JediTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: You have found my home , Thank You..Happy is enjoying her SMARTBONES🐕
customer_reviews.author: FILLED WITH SMILES

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love these
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. He knows exactly where there kept and will ask for one.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly McMaster

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs love these!
customer_reviews.text: It's a small bag, and our dogs go through it quickly! They love these treats, and there's no gastric problems either.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Sodeman

customer_reviews.title: Treat that she's always loved
customer_reviews.text: We have a large german shepherd lab mix and she has loved these treats since we got her. When she was smaller I do think they helped calm her down a little, but probably not so much anymore.
customer_reviews.author: b

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: My dogs did like these but I only bought for calming effect. There wasn't one.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Not too shabby
customer_reviews.text: I was a little anxious to try these because of all the "calming" products out there. My dog really enjoyed them and they seemed to help her out.
customer_reviews.author: Ylemchata

customer_reviews.title: CAUSED SEIZURES IN MY LABRADOR
customer_reviews.text: I would give these a negative review if i could. This product caused a series of 2 grand mal cluster seizures in my chocolate lab. gave her one before bed - 5 am she was seizing out of control. this is the only thing new introdiced into her diet. I gave her another at 5pm. she was seizing again by 930pm. DO NOT RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: They don't work like advertised
customer_reviews.text: These don't really calm as far as I can tell. Two is the serving size per day and for a 125 pound lab/Mastiff mix it does nothing. They do make good treats.
customer_reviews.author: Anita J. Stafford

customer_reviews.title: Take it or leave it
customer_reviews.text: He did like them but it would be gone very quickly...as far as calming the pet? I could not see a difference. Our pet is an 8 pound house dog.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Eyes

customer_reviews.title: my dog likes them
customer_reviews.text: My dog gets one of these every evening. They are gone really quickly, but he appears very satisfied. He was on an anti-anxiety supplement (Solliquin) that worked really well for years. Recently he refused to eat it or any food associated with it. His anxiety has increased and these bones at least help a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Je

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these
customer_reviews.text: I have not found anything my dog likes better and it seems to be very beneficial to how she feels also.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn M. Ives

customer_reviews.title: Quick bone
customer_reviews.text: Dog likes these bones. They don’t calm him down any but he likes them just fine. Good to keep him busy for a minute.
customer_reviews.author: CMAMA

customer_reviews.title: Chewed up in 5 min...
customer_reviews.text: It smells good and our dog loves it but certainly no chew improvement towards our furniture... It is chewed away very rapidly anyway...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and both of my dogs love them. They're all I buy for them nowadays
customer_reviews.text: My friend gave me a pack of these, and both of my dogs love them. They're all I buy for them nowadays. Not sure how much the calming effect really is, but they smell yummy and keep my dogs busy when I am trying to make my escape to leave the house.
customer_reviews.author: wheatbix

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT GIVE THIS TO YOUR DOG!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this thinking I was giving my dogs a healthy alternative to rawhide chews. My poor dog had bloody diarrhea from eating these! We took her to the vet, and $140 later, she's okay. I should've paid better attention to the reviews! Beware! Product is made in Vietnam.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite from Smartsticks.
customer_reviews.text: I like that the young puppies could chew on these. It was their least favorite flavor. Chicken was good, peanut butter was their favorite
customer_reviews.author: Kerowyn

customer_reviews.title: My Dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. I wasn't for sure if it would agree with my black lab stomach but she tolerated them well and really likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Dog seems to love it.
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars cause my dog loves this at night before bed. He gobbles them down in less than 2 mins, it feels like. Since my dog can’t tell me I have to assume the taste is good to him, but the smell isn’t great(?), and I wish the number of sticks were more. All in all I will keep repurchasing until he no longer eats them. I hope other dogs enjoy it as much as mine does.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You Want These
customer_reviews.text: The doggos love them, and they work well to calm but not knock them out. Great price, too!
customer_reviews.author: Ricki Cardenas

customer_reviews.title: We have a subscription
customer_reviews.text: When we leave the house, we like to give my german shepherd one of these treats to keep her busy and calm. She's ~70 lbs, and we give her them on a semi-regular basis. She never gets tired of them.
customer_reviews.author: allison

customer_reviews.title: No good for my dog
customer_reviews.text: Every time I give my dog this treat, he always poo soft and green color. No very good for my dog, maybe my dog is allergy to some of the ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Pups love them!
customer_reviews.text: My cavalier king charles spaniel and American eskimo both love these! My eskie blows through it in 15mins but my cavi takes about 45mins-1hr.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Give it time
customer_reviews.text: She didn't like these at first but now she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Willcox

customer_reviews.title: Active Senior
customer_reviews.text: Given to my senior dog at night to help him wind down.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these when he gets anxiety!
customer_reviews.text: Maybe lasts my Boston Terrier 5-10min to chew on but the effects are very relaxing!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: They break up easily for her and she eats them fast
customer_reviews.text: My cocker spaniel loves these and eats them in a minute, literally. They break up easily for her and she eats them fast. While they have lavender & camomile, they do not appear to calm her at all. But, apparel you they taste good to her.
customer_reviews.author: Pgrthouse

customer_reviews.title: Green
customer_reviews.text: Not sure I got the correct item. The ones I received were green. All other SmartBones product I've purchased have been identical to the photo provided, but these were green. They smelled fine and the package looked okay. My dog doesn't seem to like them, but he's picky.
customer_reviews.author: Syn

product_meta.title: SmartBones Chicken Dog Chews Calming (16 Sticks)
product_meta.description: Style:standartDreamBone chews have all the benefits of a rawhide chew without the rawhide. No-rawhide DreamBone chews are made with real chicken, beef, bacon and cheese or sweet potato and wholesome vegetables for a scrumptious taste dogs can’t resist! No-rawhide DreamBone Medium Chews for dogs are made with real beef, chicken and wholesome vegetables for an irresistible taste dogs dream about. Enriched with vitamins and minerals, these chews are a healthy alternative to rawhide. Treat your pup to these highly digestible and 100 percent delicious chews. DreamBone Medium Chews promote healthy teeth and gums through the natural action of chewing, making them a treat both you and your dog can love. Give your dog 1 to 2 DreamBone Medium Chews per day. Always supervise your pup during chewing activity and provide access to fresh, clean water. These chews are intended for intermittent or supplemental feeding only. Store in a cool, dry place. After opening, reseal or store in an airtight container to preserve freshness. The experts at DreamBone brand want you to have healthy, happy dogs. We know that your dog is more than a pet – they’re family. Chewing is an essential, healthy and enjoyable activity for dogs. Dog chews help keep teeth clean, jaws strong and are mentally stimulating to help prevent boredom and destructive behavior. DreamBone chews help satisfy a dog’s natural chewing instinct.
feature_bullets: Now made in Vietnam; With Chamomile & Lavender
Made with Real Chicken and Vegetables
